examples.eng: He was lying on the bed.
Jane was lying on the sofa, asleep.
examples.pl: (Jane leżała na sofie, pogrążona we śnie.)

examples.eng: She looked up from where she was lying.
examples.pl: (Ona spojrzała z miejsca, w którym leżała.)

examples.eng: Here lies one of the greatest warriors of our times.
examples.pl: (Tutaj został pochowany jeden z największych wojowników naszych czasów.)

examples.eng: Where does your grandfather lie?
The problem lies in the lack of communication between them.
examples.pl: (Problem leży w braku komunikacji między nimi.)

examples.eng: We have to find out where the problem lies.
Spain lies in the west of Europe.
Do you know where Wroclaw lies?
Don't lie to me.
I think she was lying.
Who knows what else he's lied about?
examples.pl: (Kto wie, o czym jeszcze on skłamał?)

examples.eng: He's telling lies all the time.
It was just a pack of lies.
He laid the book on a table.
Lay your suitcase next to mine.
She laid her hand on his shoulder.
I would not lay money on it.
I laid money on the winning horse.
He told me that he wanted to lay her.
examples.pl: (Powiedział mi, że chce uprawiać z nią seks.)

examples.eng: He laid her when we weren't at home.
examples.pl: (On uprawiał z nią seks, kiedy nas nie było w domu.)

examples.eng: We can't hire a lay person, this job is too serious.
examples.pl: (Nie możemy zatrudnić osoby bez kwalifikacji, ta praca jest zbyt poważna.)

examples.eng: My lay knowledge doesn't allow me to discuss this topic.
examples.pl: (Moja laicka wiedza nie pozwala mi na dyskutowanie na ten temat.)

examples.eng: I will sing you a romantic lay.
I wrote a lay. Can I read it to you?
She has a new lay.
He is married and has a lay.
"Who is that chick next to Tom?" "That's his new lay."
examples.pl: ("Co to za laska obok Toma?" "To jego nowa dupa.")

examples.eng: She offered me a lay.
It was just a quick lay, I don't even remember her name.
examples.pl: (To był tylko szybki numerek, nawet nie pamiętam jej imienia.)
